definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
(neologism c. 2018) worthy of being used as a textbook example/exemplary/classic/quintessential

sentences.english: Boy stole a lesson-book from one of his school-fellows and took it home to his Mother.
sentences.chinese: 有個男孩偷了同學的一本教科書，帶回家給母親。

sentences.english: This basic concept is illustrated in most texts on hyd aulics.
sentences.chinese: 這個基本概念在大多數水力學教科書中已有介紹。

sentences.english: Traditional schoolbook says inflation will cause devaluation.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的教科書說通貨膨脹將導致貨幣貶值。

sentences.english: Content Analysis Study on Character Education in Textbooks of Learning Area of Integrated …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣國民小學中年級綜合活動領域教科書融入品德。
些內容在你們的教科書上也有。

sentences.english: He's worth three chapters in a textbook.
sentences.chinese: 他的功勳彪炳，值得在教科書裏大寫特寫。

sentences.english: Figures and diagrams are based on the textbook Essential Psychopharmacology, c1996.
sentences.chinese: 數字和圖表是基於教科書的基本精神藥理學，時限。

sentences.english: A brown package lay on the top of the book.
sentences.chinese: 王老師看到教科書上放着一個棕色的紙包。

sentences.english: But regrettably, yes, yes Bochum textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 但遺憾的是，是波鴻的教科書。

sentences.english: The textbooks for middle school students have been reset.
sentences.chinese: 中學生教科書現已重新排版。

sentences.english: Our textbook only skims the surface of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教科書對越南戰爭的描述只是輕描淡寫。

sentences.english: "The Matrix" rewrote the text book for movie science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 駭客帝國爲科幻電影重新改寫了教科書。

sentences.english: She has also written dozens of articles and coauthored three textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 她還撰寫了數十篇文章並與人合著了三部教科書。

sentences.english: There are some misunderstandings in inquiry design in social studies textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 新課程社會科教科書在探究設計方面存在着一些誤區。

sentences.english: A large percentage of school-books now have pictures.
sentences.chinese: 現在大部分教科書有插圖。

sentences.english: Both of these popular ambiguous images are ubiquitously seen in psychology textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 這兩幅著名的多意圖像常見於心理學教科書中。

definition: to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
